body_html: I think it is also important to keep in mind that the reason for making these queries about valid moves centralized is because mutability is going to make a bunch of moves that appear to be topologically valid become invalid. We can to limit the number of places that have to interact with the metadata about mutating operators.
body_text: I think it is also important to keep in mind that the reason for making these queries about valid moves centralized is because mutability is going to make a bunch of moves that appear to be topologically valid become invalid. We can to limit the number of places that have to interact with the metadata about mutating operators.
body: I think it is also important to keep in mind that the reason for making these queries about valid moves centralized is because mutability is going to make a bunch of moves that appear to be topologically valid become invalid. We can to limit the number of places that have to interact with the metadata about mutating operators.
